name: William Owens
description:
A man walked into a Logan Township, New Jersey, UPS facility and opened fire. Police said William Owens fired shots into the ceiling of the mail center before taking two women hostage. One of those women was a former girlfriend, police said. The chaos ended with police shooting and killing Owens.
